name: Coffeescape
description:
Gwenaëlle, journalist, died the the day she finished a big project she was working on. your goal in this escape is to find what is project is and what to do with it : and quickly before her killer come for you !

______________________________

This game was realised for the coffee jam 2018 of MissMyu. Happy birthday.

Big thank to my sister for listening to me and give me advice. 

The game hasn't be tested. if you play it, please give me feedback in the comments. 

Have fun  !!!
